descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]This is "AND HIS NAME IS JHON CENA!!!!" sneak attack sound replacer for those who couldn't get the mod from steam workshop [/size][/font]
<br />
[size=3]installing this manuel simple and easy just copy the sound file to skyrim data file and it will wor

<br />

[size=5](careful !!! for those who use other sounds the .wav named ui_sneakattack_01
if you have other sounds just delete that .wav in Sound\fx\ui)[/size][/center]
author: VanDalyon
